import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { CurrencyDollarIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, ClockIcon, ChartBarIcon, ArrowRightIcon, CheckIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const Landing = () => { const features = [ { icon: ShieldCheckIcon, title: 'Secure Escrow', description: 'Your money is held safely in escrow until loan terms are accepted' }, { icon: ClockIcon, title: 'Flexible Repayment', description: '10-day grace periods with rolling 1% block fees for missed payments' }, { icon: ChartBarIcon, title: 'CIBIL Reporting', description: 'Transparent credit reporting to help build your credit history' }, { icon: CurrencyDollarIcon, title: 'Low Fees', description: 'Only 1% initial platform fee, no hidden charges' } ]; const benefits = [ 'Complete KYC verification process', 'Real-time loan tracking and management', 'Automated payment reminders', 'Transparent fee structure', 'Mobile-friendly interface', '24/7 customer support' ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

PaySafe

Friend-to-Friend P2P Lending Platform

Lend and borrow money safely with friends. Complete KYC verification, secure escrow, flexible repayment terms, and transparent CIBIL reporting.

Get Started Sign In
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose PaySafe?

Built with security, transparency, and user experience in mind

{features.map((feature, index) => { const Icon = feature.icon; return (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

); })}
{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

Simple steps to start lending or borrowing

1

Complete KYC

Verify your identity with PAN, Aadhaar, and bank account details

2

Create or Accept Loan

Lenders fund escrow, borrowers accept terms to receive funds

3

Repay & Track

Make payments, track progress, and build your credit history

{/* Benefits Section */}

Everything You Need for Safe P2P Lending

PaySafe provides a complete platform for friend-to-friend lending with enterprise-grade security and compliance features.

{benefits.map((benefit, index) => (
{benefit}
))}

Ready to Get Started?

Join thousands of users who trust PaySafe for their P2P lending needs

Create Account
{/* Demo Section */}

Try Our Demo

Experience the full PaySafe platform with our interactive demo. No real money required - just explore the features!

Demo Credentials

user_a@paysafe.com

demo123

demo123

{/* Footer */}
PS
PaySafe

Secure P2P Lending Platform

); }; export default Landing;
